Package scar

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IServer
    Standard interface for servers to download/upload chunks to.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Chunk
    Chunk stores all the data and information related to a chunk during GetFile/StoreFile for use in Downloading/Uploading the chunk itself and for reassembly information during RS decode
    ChunkMeta
    ChunkMeta[] is the output of StoreFile and input to GetFile This stores meta data about each chunk associated with the file short of the actual position in the hashchain which is later calculated with the key during that actual process.
    DerivedKeyGen
    DerivedKeyGen is a wrapper class for Spongy Castles PKCS5S2 (PBKDF2) to generated keys derived from a password with a random salt.
    Encryption
    Encryption handles both the encryption and decryption of files in the SCAR system this is done via Spongy Castle using AES-GCM 256
    GaloisField
    Implementation of Galois field arithmetics with 2^p elements.
    GetFile
    GetFile contains the combined logic for Retrival of a file given the filename, key and set of servers associated with it An overview of the process can be seen:
    Hash
    Hash contains any hash-related functionality to the application this includes: - hashchainning - generating HMACs - verifying HMACs
    Matrix
    Colleciton of Matrix operations needed for @see RS RS to work All operations are done in a @see GaloisField GaloisField with 2^8 elements
    NoEncryption
    Encryption method if no encryption on the file is desired The methods here make no changes to the input data
    Pad
    Pad handles how to pad data in various ways and to unpad that same data
    RndKeyGen
    Wrapper for Spongy Castles SP800SecureRandom method for generating a random sequence of bytes
    RS
    RS handles the RS algorithm for encoding our data into chunks and decoding chunks back into a single data stream
    Shuffle
    Shuffle wrapper for shuffling an array via java Collections.shuffle
    StorageTask
    Handles actual uploading and downloading of a chunk to a server
    StoreFile
    StoreFile has the combined logic to take a file and store it across our servers in chunk form An overview of the process can be seen:
    Tests
    A series of old tests to test the functionality of LogicLibrary Some of these tests are outdated and not used anymore
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidInputException
    Generic exception for invalid inputs into LogicLibrary
